overlap.none: There are no overlapping shifts. You're good!

contracts.disableDateChangeInfo: You can move your contract start and end dates closer to your first and last shift, but must include the shift inside the date range.
contracts.name: Name your contract

carryover.checkboxLabel: Carryover work time from previous month

clock.changeContract: You are clocked into a different contract.

problems.deletedAll: You have deleted all staged shifts. You can either clock out, without saving new shifts, or reset your actions.
problems.text: A shift must end on the same day it started. Therefore, we will need to split your shift. Make a decision on what to do.
problems.title: Invalid shift

snacks.shiftTooShort: Shifts shorter than a minute are not saved.

contractExpired.title: The contract expired
contractExpired.text: You cannot interact with shifts in an expired contract. Change into a different one or add a new contract.

dashboard.emptyActivity: You have not clocked any shfits in this contract.

overlaps.description: We found one instance of overlapping shifts. | We found {n} instances of overlapping shifts.
overlaps.noProblems: There are no problems with your shifts.

dialogs.textConfirmDelete: Are you sure you want to @.lower:actions.delete {selectedEntity}?. @:dialogs.textPermanent

errors.minLength: {name} must be at least {length} characters long!
errors.shiftDateEndAfterStart: A shift must must before it starts.
errors.shiftDateEndRequired: You must specify an end time.
errors.shiftDateStartBeforeEnd: A shift must start before it ends.
errors.shiftDateStartRequired: You must specify a start time.

snackbar.success: We have received your message. Thank you!

feedback.text: Send us any feedback you have. We appreciate all comments!
feedback.title: Feedback

acknowledgeGU.text: The development of this project was financially supported by {link}.

gdpr.text: You can request and download all information saved by you. The download is provided in JSON.

hero.text: Clock allows you to easily edit your time sheets on your mobile device or PC.

blurb1.title: Start-and-Go! Just do your work.
blurb1.text: Simply start your shift with the clock button and close your browser. You can clock out on any device later if your work is done.

blurb2.title: Forgot to clock? No problem!
blurb2.text: Past shifts can easily be added. All shifts can be edited or even deleted - you decide which shifts will be printed on your time sheet!

logout.message: You can come back later at any time.
logout.title: Are you sure you want to logout?

models.selectedContract: the selected contract | the selected contracts
models.selectedShift: the selected shift | the selected shifts

createContract.text: Please fill in your contract details below.
createContract.title: Create {entity}

personnelNumber.text: You can fill in the below data at a point later in time.
personnelNumber.title: Optional
personnelNumber.hint: You can find your personnel number on your contract.
personnelNumber.label: Personnel number

underConstruction.text: We value your feedback. We are continuously exploring new functionality for Clock. Do not hesitate to contact us.
underConstruction.title: Under construction

welcome.text: You are new here, huh? We need to get a few things done, before you can start using Clock. We will guide you through the process!
welcome.title: @:app.onboarding

privacyagreement.text: You have to accept the {privacyAgreement} before using Clock.
privacyagreement.checkbox: I have read and agree with the privacy policy.

reports.exportAlert: Once you generate the report, you will not be able to add or update shifts in the corresponding month

hints.request: You can request and subsequently download your months report for review. You cannot request a report for the current month before locking the report for previous month of the same contract.
hints.lock: You can only lock the month after generating the report for review.

reports.personnelNumberMissing: Please add your personnel number in your user settings.

lock.label: Lock this month
lock.message: After locking this month, you will not be able to edit its shifts. This will allow you to export the report of the following month.

selectContract.hint: Change the contract to see different data

account.dialogText: Please enter your email address {email} to confirm.
account.text: You can delete you account at any time. This will purge all the data we keep on record for you. Please remember that this action is permanent and not reversible! You can create a new account afterwards.

language.text: Changing the language will take effect immediately.

shifts.assignContractDialog: Choose a contract to assign the selected shifts to.
shifts.dave: I'm sorry Dave, I'm afraid I can't do that!
shifts.empty: You have not created any shifts for this contract yet.

tags.createHint: No results matching "{search}". Press {enter} to create a new one
tags.label: Add tags

types.label: What category does this shift fall into?

shifts.wasExportedAlert: The report for this shift was already exported. This shift can not be edited anymore.
